Comments_List: A good overview of Inca archaeology as well as the ability to bring archaeology, history, art history, and social theory into a fruitful investigation of a particular culture.
Professor Burgers insights are wonderful. The course can get a little side-tracked and behind schedule because of his affinity for having students present each of the readings.
If youre looking to learn about the Incas or the Andes in general, this is a great course.
